Name: Sandfall Block
Tooltip: Falling sand you can safely watch

Name: Snowfall Block
Tooltip: A lot cooler than a snow globe

Name: Snow Cloud
Tooltip: Prevents fall damage . It gets pretty cold up there

Name: Golf Cup
Tooltip: Aim to sink your golf ball in the cup. Lets everyone know how well you did

Name: Anti-Portal Block
Tooltip: Portals cannot be created on the surface of these blocks

Name: Thin Ice
Tooltip: Breaks when fallen on. 'Watch your step'

Name: Grate
Tooltip: Allows only liquids through. Can be toggled open or closed. 'They'rrrre great!'

Name: Stone Accent Slab
Tooltip: A Stone Slab variant that merges differently with nearby blocks. Favored by advanced builders
